name: Templar DAO
description: Templar DAO is The Protocol-Owned Liquidity (POL) in DeFi 2.0 launch on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). The protocol is powered by the TEM token, which is backed by a basket of assets like BUSD, LPs, etc. in the Templar treasury giving it an intrinsic value that it cannot fall below. Templar also introduces economic and game-theoretic dynamics into the market through staking and minting.
